headline: Is EPAM Systems Inc. (EPAM) Mid-Cap IT Stock Outperforming The Market In 2025?
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Mid-Cap IT Stocks Outperforming The Market In 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where EPAM Systems Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) stands against other mid-cap IT stocks outperforming the market in 2025. US Stocks continue their recovery from a post-DeepSeek and post-tariffs period as nerves […]
